attributes.action: Encourage amateur associations to change their seasonal dates.
attributes.additional_details:
By having to play 3-4 games every week towards the end of every season, is a huge strain on the amateur player. 

The amateur player has family and work commitments. We hear professionals complaining of midweek games. Yet we have 2 in 3 days. 

Everyone suffers. Players, managers, referees & most of all, the standard of play.

Please consider:

a) Starting new seasons weeks after the end of the previous.

b) No football over winter period.

Let common sense prevail. 

Please support by signing
attributes.background:
Yet again this season we have been unable to play every week due to adverse weather conditions. A handful of games since December is all we have mustered. This is something that happens every season. 

The amateur associations must act and change season dates. Summer play is a necessity.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of amateur football clubs.
